name: Évaluation entreprise intermédiaire 1
desc: Apprenticeship project for France - First evaluation

name: Libunit
desc: Design a Micro-framework in C language dedicated to testing.

name: Day 00
desc: Today, you will learn the basics of solving both trivial and more challenging business tasks using basic Java language constructs.

name: APCSP-Programming
desc: Join this project to study specific topics related to programming.

name: Open Project - Define your Subject
desc: This first sub-project aims to define thoroughly the selected topic for the global open project, the precise goals with all details and characteristics, to be completed by the end of the open project. It's a first step centered on planning and presentation.

name: Part 1: Linked Lists
desc: In this project, you'll build your own version of the classic linked-list structure and implement typical functions used on linked lists. The finished linked list will be used within your final project - PvNP.

name: Runestone Academy - AP Java
desc: For this topic, we would like you to make an account on Runestone Academy and work through their course "Java Review for the AP CS A Exam". Then complete the supplementary material in the other project in this group. https://runestone.academy/runestone/books/published/apcsareview/index.html

name: Intro to OOP
desc: Object oriented programming is very common modern design pattern. It's a strategy to make your code more readable to others and to prevent code repetition. This project covers all the basic fundamentals of OOP: classes and objects, class variables & methods vs instance variables & methods, inheritance, polymorphism.

name: API Creation
desc: This project is a basic introduction to learning backend development with Node.js.

name: ML_01
desc: Learn about the essential python libraries for machine learning

name: Go 00
desc: This is an introduction to Go (Golang) programming language. At the end we will be writing the simpliest CLI program in Go.

name: Web01 - HTML_CSS
desc: For web development, first learn the essentials of HTML and CSS. In this project we will build a grid-style website with input forms, styling, and links. In the sequel to this project we'll add Javascript functionality to the site.

name: Map Your Own Adventure
desc:
Before you begin your own self-directed project at 42, set the stage by proposing your project plan and sharing your ambitions with some friends.

The only steps are: (1) Plan out and define your project mission. (2) Research what software, languages, libraries or platforms you need to make it happen. Try installing them on the computers. (3) Get your project plan reviewed!

name: Matchbox
desc: A competition-style puzzle for you to bend your mind around! Just remember, no pyromania near the Macs.

name: Internet Simulator: Binary Encodings
desc: Pair project to practice using binary and hexadecimal number systems. **NOTE:** At the end of the day, have your mentor grade your project with their rubric rather than signing up for corrections.

name: APCSP - Explore Practice
desc: **When you are done with this project, contact Sangita for feedback on your practice work.**

name: Nemean Lion
desc: As Hercules stay in the shadows to get access to the lion throat

name: Matrice CPA
desc: Projets entrepreneuriaux concernant le compte personnel d'activité, en lien avec l'ENA et les organismes publics en charge de sa mise en oeuvre et gestion.

name: Electronics Selection Test
desc: Il s'agit du QCM de sélection pour participer au projet d'électronique.

name: ft_hangouts
desc: Ce projet a pour but de vous initier au développement d'application Android. Il s'agit de réaliser, en JAVA, une application mobile de gestion de contacts sur la plateforme Android de Google.  Le but ici est de comprendre comment fonctionne une application Android, comment Android gère votre application et comment utiliser le SDK.

name: Piscine OCaml
desc: Cette piscine OCaml est la porte d'entrée vers les projets de programmation fonctionnelle du cursus 42. Vous aborderez ici le paradigme fonctionnel à travers les spécificités de l'OCaml.

name: Trainees sessions
desc: Dans cette première partie, participez à une journée de training sur les techniques de communication orale en entreprise. Au menu : argumentation, entretiens, conflits, et autres situations classiques d'entreprise. Egalement, la communication verbale et non verbale.

name: Communication Trainer
desc: Vous voulez vous préparer à vos entretiens de stages, developper vos capacités d'argumentation lors de réunions, être capable de résoudre des conflits en entreprise (ou lors des peer-évaluation à 42)  ? Suivez une journée de formation sur les techniques de communication orales en entreprise ! Si vous les souhaitez, dans un second temps, il peut être possible à votre tour de former des groupes d'étudiant.

name: Final Internship
desc: Votre cursus 42 se clos sur une dernière période d'insertion professionnelle : le stage final. Ce stage est l'accomplissement de votre parcours, il vous permettra d'aller démontrer votre expertise en entreprise, et vous servira de tremplin pour lancer votre carrière.

name: Part-time
desc: Une bonne insertion professionnelle reste un des objectifs fondamenteaux de l'école. Nous vous donnons, via ce projet, la possibilité de valoriser une activité professionnelle à temps partiel sur la troisième partie de votre scolarité.

name: strace
desc: First step in a serie of projects in C language leading to creation of a mini-GDB, this project will ask you to recode strace, a tool allowing you to list syscalls done by a running program

name: 42run
desc: Been to Temple Run? It's time to do it again! This intermediate OpenGL project invites you to recreate this mobile game. Have fun: all the bonuses are possible to exceed the famous franchise.

name: BSQ
desc: Now we're not kidding. The Vogons need you to find the largest possible field to play Brockian Simple-Qricket. It's up to you to combine all these new C notions to create an algorithm capable of detecting the largest perfect square in an obstacle map.

name: Scop
desc: Your first steps in the world of 3D on GPU with OpenGL. You will become acquainted with the main concepts during this small game project.

name: Taskmaster
desc: You will write a job control program, in the language of your choice. What you will need to accomplish is very similar to the supervisor program.

name: ComputorV1
desc: Le but de ce projet est de vous faire (re)prendre contact avec la manipulation d’outils mathématiques élémentaires, qui pourront vous être utiles dans de nombreux autres sujets de 42. Il ne s’agit pas de faire des maths pour faire des maths, mais bien de vous permettre d’aborder plus progressivement et sereinement les sujets où il y en a besoin. Vous êtes libres dans le choix de langage pour réaliser le sujet.

name: Gomoku
desc: This project involves creating, in the language of your choice, a Gomoku game integrating an AI player capable of beating a human player the fastest way possible. To do this, you will implement a min-max algorithm but also do research, trial and error to find the most adapted heuristics. This will not be as easy as checkers.

name: Expert System
desc: This project involves creating, in the language of your choice, an expert system in proposal calculation. In other words, a program that can reason on a set of rules and initial facts to deduce other facts.

name: N-puzzle
desc: We are going to do, in any language, a program capable to solve n-puzzles of various sizes, as optimized as possible

name: Nibbler
desc: Ce projet de C++ vous fait recoder le jeu Snake avec plusieurs interfaces graphiques différentes

name: Hotrace
desc: Finally, it's not very complicated to build a search engine like Google. All you need is a lot of information, then just look for keywords inside. No, the difficulty is to do it quickly. And then there is a fierce struggle between google, yahoo, bing, and a whole bunch of others that almost didn't exist any more when you were born. It's a race where everyone's on fire: the HotRace.

name: Évaluation entreprise finale
desc: Apprenticeship project for France - Final evaluation

name: Hotrace
desc: Making a search engine like Google or Safari, is not so complicated in the end. The steps are simple: get a lof of data, then just  perform search using keywords. All the difficulty lies in returning the responses quickly. There is fierce competition in the search industry between Google, Yahoo, Bing and a whole bunch of other search engines that hardly existed. It's a race where everyone is on the hot seat.

name: Apprentissage 1 an - 1
desc: Vous pourrez vous insrire au projet quand vous aurez atteint le niveau requis. Une fois fait, il faudra push un fichier vide dans le repo puis set as finish le projet. En suite, la moulinette vous donnera l'xp.

name: Day 01
desc: This day will help you to get the basic knowledge about syntax and semantics of Python.

desc: This second and most important step of the global open-project is dedicated to the realisation of the previously validated subject, using project management and group management to reach the target.

name: Part 2: Queues and Stacks
desc: In this project, build on top of your linked list implementation to create the classic Queue (first in, first out) and Stack (first in, last out) data structures. These ones will also be used within your final project of Plants vs Non-Plants!

desc: Try coding Snake, Helicopter ("flappy bird"), or Pong using Pygame.

name: ML_02

name: p5js-01
desc: This section is about mouse-click interaction and if statements, AKA, creating interactive buttons.

name: Parseltongue - Part 1
desc: A big introduction into the world of Python. These topics first: * Variables * Strings * Input * String manipulation & placing variables into strings * if/else * index * equality * integers * incrementing/decrementing * for loops. Make sure you register for the class "42python49" on Runestone Academy.

name: Internet Simulator: Network Architecture
desc: This week! A group project for the second half of the Internet Simulator. You will be graded by your mentors.

name: APCSP - Create Task
desc: Build your Create project for the AP portfolio, and sign up for a peer correction to receive feedback on your project and to earn points for completing it.

name: Crypto intro
desc: In this beginner cryptography project you are challenged to encode, decode, and try to crack the Ceaser and Vignere ciphers.

name: Matrice CEA
desc: Participation au programme Matrice avec le CEA

name: Lernaean Hydra
desc: The second of the half-gods Labours

name: Factrace
desc: Finally, it's not very complicated to make an algorithm to break RSA keys. All you have to do is have a big number, then just look for your first factors. No, the difficulty is to do it quickly. And then there is a fierce struggle between the NSA, CIA, Apple, and a whole bunch of others that already existed when you were born. It's a race where everyone wants to fry the others: the FactRace.

name: Electronics Project
desc: Projet principal d'électronique, pour ceux qui ont été sélectionnés.

name: Training the community
desc: Dans un second temps, après avoir participé à une session de training, vous pouvez intégrer l'équipe de formateurs (souvent pour la saison suivante). Une sélection est effectuée par l'équipe en place pour pourvoir les places disponibles.

name: Hive Startup Internship - Entrepreneurship mid evaluation
AlCu

name: LLDB
desc: A debugger is software that helps a developer analyze program bugs. To do this, it makes it possible to execute the program step-by-step, display the value of the variables at any time, set up breakpoints on conditions or on program lines... This rush is simply to help you discover methods that can be used by a debugger to detect bugs on your programs in general. Once this rush is over, the use of lldb specifically will no longer have any secrets for you.

Wong kar Wai
desc: Have fun by coding the 2048 game.

name: Erymanthian Boar
desc: Capture the Erymanthian Boar

name: Puissance 4
desc:
If you had a happy childhood, you probably played the famous Connect 4 (Puissance 4) board game. If not, then it's time to make up for that lack.
As you understood when reading the title, the purpose of this rush is to write a Connect 4 game. It's already a great topic as it stands, but remember that you'll also have to write an AI to play against. Isn't that wonderful?

name: yasl
desc: This rush will make you discover a new coding language. Adaptation is definitely a key here.

desc: Dive into Machine Learning with IBM's Coursera lessons, then build a linear regression model on your own! Build your portfolio by then uploading it to Github and creating a README.

name: APCSP - Vocabulary
desc: Use the vocabulary spreadsheet linked here and use it to keep track of your study progress.

desc: Code Connect 4 on the command line.

desc: Learn how to code in JavaScript, the language of choice for modern web and app development.

name: Augean stables
desc: Using two tools, clean the Augean stables

name: Domino
desc:
This rush consists in the realization of an artificial intelligence capable of playing dominoes.
She can make coffee if you want, but I don't drink coffee, so just focus on dominoes.

name: Piscine Unity
desc: Vous avez déjà rêvé de programmer un jeu video ? Unity est une plate-forme de developpement graphique 2D et 3D simple à prendre en main sur laquelle vous pourrez developper vos premiers jeux videos pendant cette piscine !

name: Day 05
desc: Today you will use the key mechanisms to work with PostgreSQL DBMS via JDBC

name: Day 05
desc: This day will help you acquire skills with Pandas.

name: [DEPRECATED] webserv (OwO)
desc: This project is here to make you write your own HTTP server. You will follow the real HTTP RFC and you will be able to test it with a real browser. HTTP is one of the most used protocol on internet. Knowing its arcane will be useful, even if you won't be working on a website.

name: IBM Machine Learning 01
desc: Continue your journey with IBM's Machine Learning. You'll continue with Coursera, and then build a classification model using K Nearest Neighbors.

name: Web Basics 01 - Recipe
desc: Learn the basics of creating websites with Free Code Camp and then create a recipe page about your favorite food! You'll learn how to get your site online for the world to see.

name: Pygame
desc: This project covers topics like: *Pygame Basics *Primitive Drawing * Functions *Animation

name: APCSP - Practice Exam
desc: APCSP - Exam

name: Game Of Life
desc: The Game of Life is a famous and mind-blowing computer science exercise. Code a command-line version for basic points, or, an colorful interactive version using the graphics library from Processing.org.

name: p5js-05
desc: Abstraction Part 2: Objects

name: Corewar Championship
desc: Créez l'ultime champion de Corewar et écrasez toute compétition ! (Sauf le champion de zaz)

name: Root-me | App-Systeme
desc: Do you know root-me.org? This site offers security challenges of increasing difficulty, ideal for learning and excel! We propose to validate your knowledge and hours spent on Root-Me via this project. This series of Root-Me challenges is intended to help you discover how to detect and exploit vulnerabilities on ELF32 binaries. To approach it, you will of course need knowledge in C, assembler and a certain familiarity with gdb. Good luck !

name: Introduction to iOS
desc: The purpose of this rush is to introduce you to the development of applications under IOS, and this rocks! You will need to build a functional IOS application with some basic features. Simple, right?

name: Connect4
desc: Have fun by coding a Connect four and an AI

name: Day 06
desc: Today you will learn the basics of module and integration testing

name: Day 06
desc: This day will help you acquire skills with SQL.
